com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast

Interface IGroupNode<E extends IGroupMemberNode>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BOp, Cloneable, IGroupMemberNode, IPropertySet, IQueryNode, Iterable<E>, IVariableBindingRequirements, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStatementContainer, ConstructNode, GraphPatternGroup, GroupNodeBase, JoinGroupNode, PropertyPathUnionNode, QuadData, UnionNode, UpdateRoot

    public interface IGroupNode<E extends IGroupMemberNode>
extends IGroupMemberNode, Iterable<E>
    A type of query node that groups a set of query nodes together. This is the interface used by the UnionNode and JoinGroupNode query nodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.IQueryNode

        IQueryNode.Annotations

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bigdata.bop.BOp

        NOANNS, NOARGS

      boolean isEmpty()
      Return true iff the group is empty.
      IGroupNode<E> removeChild(E child)
      Remove a child from this group.
      int size()
      Return the #of children which are direct members of the group.
